title: Multi-Factor Authentication and Secure Login
summary: Develop a secure authentication system that leverages multi-factor verification.
description: Design and implement a robust log-in mechanism using multi-factor authentication (MFA) to ensure customer accounts remain secure. Incorporate password protection, one-time passcodes, and biometric authentication where applicable. Features include session management, device recognition, and advanced encryption of credentials and data. Compliance with financial security standards will be enforced to ensure both safety and reliability of customer access across desktop, mobile, and tablet devices.

title: Responsive and Personalized User Interface
summary: Create a responsive, user-friendly interface with a personalized dashboard for customers.
description: Develop a fully responsive user interface accessible on desktop, tablet, and mobile. Build a dynamic and personalized dashboard displaying accounts, eligible products, and banking services. Optimize for performance and accessibility to ensure seamless navigation. Implement customization features enabling quick access to frequently used actions and display relevant financial insights drawn from customer profile and banking history to improve engagement and satisfaction.

title: Core Banking System Integration and Local Database Management
summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the core banking system and manage local data storage efficiently.
description: Build secure, scalable integrations between the self-service portal and the core banking system via an API or middleware solution. Include a dedicated, optimized local database for real-time operations, caching, and customer data management. Implement redundancy, synchronization protocols, and transaction integrity mechanisms. Ensure system resilience, fault tolerance, and high performance during peak traffic to provide continuous availability of services.

title: Workflow Automation for Account Opening and Service Requests
summary: Develop guided workflows for account openings and service modifications.
description: Enable customers to open new accounts and request service changes through structured, streamlined workflows. Include data pre-filling, validation rules, real-time eligibility checks, and auto-save functionality for incomplete applications. Integrate these workflows with backend banking services for automated processing, status updates, and internal verification. The workflows should minimize clicks and execution time while improving customer convenience and operational efficiency.

title: Secure Document Upload and Management
summary: Implement a secure document submission and management system for customer applications.
description: Build an integrated document management module to allow customers to upload KYC and supporting documents directly through the interface. Include file format validation, virus scanning, and encryption both at rest and in transit. Allow tracking of document submission status and automated linking to active workflows for account openings or service modifications. Ensure that document handling aligns with privacy and data retention regulations.

title: Real-Time Application Tracking and Notification System
summary: Provide customers with real-time updates and notification alerts on their submitted requests.
description: Develop a centralized notification system that provides status updates for all submitted forms and workflow progress. Enable automated notification delivery through multiple communication channels including in-portal alerts, email, and SMS. Implement a self-service notifications center where customers can view all updates related to their applications or service modifications and configure their preferred communication preferences.

title: Comprehensive Activity History and Audit Trail
summary: Maintain detailed logs of all customer interactions and transactions for transparency and auditing.
description: Build a history module that records every interaction a customer performs in the portal including logins, requests, document uploads, and modifications. Present this activity history in a clear format accessible to the customer while maintaining immutable audit logs for compliance and operational review. Incorporate data retention rules, time-stamped records, and reporting capabilities to ensure regulatory and compliance readiness.

title: Role-Based Access Control and Authorization Management
summary: Define and enforce role-based permissions for customers and administrators.
description: Create a robust RBAC system that determines access to specific functionalities based on user roles and authorization levels. Ensure proper enforcement of access controls to prevent unauthorized use of financial data or administrative resources. The system must support dynamic configuration for future role expansion and integrate seamlessly with authentication logic to ensure consistent and secure user access across all components of the portal.

title: Security and Compliance Framework Implementation
summary: Implement a full-stack security and compliance framework for the self-service portal.
description: Establish an end-to-end security layer incorporating encryption, intrusion detection, and continuous monitoring. Ensure all communications follow secure transmission protocols (e.g., TLS), and sensitive data is stored and processed under compliance standards such as GDPR, PCI DSS, and ISO 27001. Schedule regular vulnerability scanning and penetration testing to proactively identify and mitigate risks, ensuring ongoing data protection and trust.
